sentences.en: A single room at the Astir Hotel costs £56 a night.
sentences.cn: 阿斯蒂尔酒店的单人间价格是56英镑一晚。

sentences.en: After a good night's sleep I feel fighting fit again.
sentences.cn: 昨夜睡得很香，我又觉得自己精力充沛了。

sentences.en: Guests bopped and jigged the night away to the disco beat.
sentences.cn: 客人们整个晚上随着迪斯科的节奏跳博普舞和吉格舞。

sentences.en: He gave a detailed account of what happened on the fateful night.
sentences.cn: 他详细描述了那个灾难性夜晚所发生的事。

sentences.en: He works obsessively from 7.15 am to 9 or 10 at night.
sentences.cn: 他工作极为投入，会从早上七点一刻一直干到晚上九十点。

sentences.en: How would you like to have dinner one night?
sentences.cn: 哪天晚上和我一起吃饭好吗？

sentences.en: I didn’t sleep too well last night.
I suggest we gather enough firewood to last the night.
sentences.cn: 我建议大家捡足够多的木柴来撑过这一晚。

sentences.en: It was a cold moonlit night.
Last night he was being held in solitary confinement in Douglas jail.
sentences.cn: 昨晚他被单独监禁在道格拉斯的监狱里。

sentences.en: Last night we hitched the horse to the cart and moved here.
sentences.cn: 昨晚我们套上马车，拉着东西搬到了这里。

sentences.en: That night she, Nicholson and the crew had a celebratory dinner.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上，她、尼科尔森和全体工作人员吃了一顿庆功宴。

sentences.en: The pain had lessened in the night, but so had his lucidity.
sentences.cn: 夜里他的痛苦是减轻了，但人也不那么清醒了。

sentences.en: They had invited me to come to supper and stay the night.
sentences.cn: 他们邀请我去吃晚饭并住上一晚。

sentences.en: Two men were helping police with their inquiries at Salisbury last night.
sentences.cn: 两名男子昨天夜里在索尔兹伯里接受了警方盘问。

sentences.en: Wendy popped in for a quick bite to eat on Monday night.
sentences.cn: 温迪周一晚上过来匆匆吃了点儿饭。

sentences.en: You're quite a party animal aren't you, out there every night.
sentences.cn: 你就是为派对而生的，不是吗，每天晚上你都去参加派对。

phrases.tran_cn: 节日的夜晚；外出的一夜
前两天的夜里；不久前的一个夜晚

trans.tran_cn: 夜，晚上，（举行盛事的）夜晚
trans.tran_en: the dark part of each 24-hour period when the sun cannot be seen and when most people sleep
